Q1.title: How can i change my name / email / address / password ?
Q1.info: To change one of these pieces of information, go to the settings tab, the account section and click on one of the pieces of information you want to change.

Q2.title: How do I post announces?
Q2.info: In order to post announces you have to go to the announces tab, complete all the fields and in the end press the 'Post announcement' button.

Q3.title: How can i talk to the person who help me?
Q3.info: In order to send a message to someone you help, you will have to go to the message tab, where you will be able to see the messages with all the people you are helping.

Q4.title: How do i help a person?
Q4.info: All you have to do is go to the announces tab and click on the announcement you want. Then you will be redirected to that announcement page where you click the green 'Help this person' at the end of the page.

Q5.title: How can I get points for the shop?
Q5.info: You can get points by helping people. The number of points obtained depends on the difficulty and duration of the activities you do.

English.defaultMessage: Hi. I need your help. I cannot write about what I need but this announce contains the category and difficulty of the task. It can be connected with me by message or call. Thank you very much!

error.cantClose: Something went wrong. We couldn't close the announce!
